channel.title: How to Launch my server without no-ip
channel.description: Can people (including me) simply connect to my server by just typing my IP address into the login screen if my source is running?

item.title: How to Launch my server without no-ip
item.dc:creator: @Dart_Zamaki Dart Zamaki
item.description:
@Dart_Zamaki wrote:

Sorry, no. You need a “online” server for other people to find your computer to log in. (id show you a tutorial, but moparscape has taken out any tutorial that is worth anything.)

Read full topic
item.source: How to Launch my server without no-ip
